mapper.select: SELECT ar.article_id, ar.author_id, ar.title, ar.brief_introduction, ar.modified_time FROM article ar, blog_info info WHERE ar.article_id = info.article_id ORDER BY info.likes LIMIT 0,#{quantity}

SELECT ar.article_id, ar.author_id, ar.title, ar.brief_introduction, ar.modified_time FROM article ar, blog_info info WHERE ar.article_id = info.article_id ORDER BY info.likes LIMIT #{curPage},#{size}
SELECT count(ar.article_id) FROM article ar, blog_info info WHERE ar.article_id = info.article_id ORDER BY info.likes
SELECT ar.article_id, ar.author_id, ar.title, ar.brief_introduction, ar.modified_time FROM article ar ORDER BY ar.modified_time LIMIT 0,#{quantity}

SELECT DISTINCT ar.article_id, ar.title, ar.brief_introduction, uin.author_id, uin.avatar_path, uin.nick_name, bin.pageviews, bin.likes, bin.collection FROM article ar,blog_info bin, user_info uin WHERE ar.author_id = uin.author_id AND bin.article_id = ar.article_id AND (
ar.title like concat("%",#{keyword},"%")
or
ar.brief_introduction like concat("%",#{keyword},"%")
or
ar.label like concat("%",#{keyword},"%") ) LIMIT #{currentPage},#{size}

SELECT count(1) FROM article ar,blog_info bin, user_info uin WHERE ar.author_id = uin.author_id AND bin.article_id = ar.article_id AND (
ar.title like concat("%",#{keyword},"%")
or
ar.brief_introduction like concat("%",#{keyword},"%")
or
ar.label like concat("%",#{keyword},"%") )
